pages.privacy-policy: ParadiseGrove - Privacy Policy ParadiseGrove HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact ParadiseGrove Privacy Policy This privacy policy outlines the privacy practices of ParadiseGrove ("we" or "us"). It explains how information is gathered, utilized, and disclosed by ParadiseGrove, as well as the options you have in connection with that information. Information We Gather We collect various types of information for different purposes to enhance our services to you. Personal Details While using our website, we may request you to provide certain personally identifiable details that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Details"). Personally identifiable details may include, but are not limited to, your name, email address, postal address, phone number, etc. Usage Information We may also gather information on how you access and interact with the website ("Usage Information"). This Usage Information may include details such as your browser type, IP address, operating system, referral source, duration of visit to pages, etc. This Usage Information is used to enhance the website and understand user interactions. Utilization of Collected Information We use the collected information for various purposes: To provide and maintain our website; To improve and optimize our website; To understand how users interact with the website; To personalize your experience; To respond to your inquiries and requests; Disclosure of Information We may share your information with third parties for the following reasons: To contractors and service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing related services. In response to a subpoena, court order, or other legal process; to establish or exercise our legal rights; to defend against legal claims; and as required to comply with applicable law. Data Security The security of your information is important to us, but please remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Your Options You have several options regarding your information: You can choose not to provide certain information, but then you may not be able to use certain features of the website. You can access and update your information by contacting us. The ParadiseGrove website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline ParadiseGrove DISCLAIMERS PRIVACY AND POLICY TERMS AND CONDITIONS
